{{Infobox company | name = Ubisoft QuÃ©bec | logo = [[Image:Ubisoft.png|Ubisoft logo]] | type = [[Subsidiary]] of [[Ubisoft]] | genre = | foundation = [[Quebec City]], [[Quebec]] (2005) | founder = | location_city = [[Quebec City]] | location_country =
| location = 390, boul. Charest Est | key_people = Nicolas Rioux ([[Chief executive officer|CEO]]) | industry = [[Video game industry|Video games]] | products = [[Video game]]s | num_employees = ~300 (2010) | parent = [[Ubisoft]] | owner = [[Ubisoft]] | divisions = | subsid = | slogan = | homepage = [http://www.ubisoft.ca Ubisoft.ca] | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Ubisoft Quebec''' ({{lang-fr|Ubisoft QuÃ©bec}}) is [[Canadian]] [[video game developer]] [[Ubisoft]]'s North American studio located in [[Quebec City]], [[Quebec]]. Founded as a subsidiary of Ubisoft in June 2005, initially developing low-profile projects, the studio now has over 300 employees.http://www.cyberpresse.ca/le-soleil/affaires/jeux-et-logiciels/201012/01/01-4348268-ubisoft-quebec-ouvre-ses-portes-au-public-samedi.php Ubisoft Quebec has since developed the [[Wii]] version of ''[[Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands (Wii)|Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands]]'' and contributed to ''[[Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood]]''.http://ps3.ign.com/articles/113/1131042p1.html ==History== The studio's goal was to seek new talents and ideas from eastern [[Quebec]]. [[Ubisoft]] took opportunity of investments made into the expanding technological sector Nouvo St-Roch by [[Quebec City]]. ==Games developed== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Game ! Year of release ! Platforms |- | ''[[Rainbow Six: Critical Hour]]'' | 2006 | [[Xbox]] |- | ''[[Open Season (video game)|Open Season]]'' | 2006 | [[PlayStation Portable|PSP]], [[Nintendo DS|DS]]http://www.mobygames.com/game/open-season__ |- | ''[[Rainbow Six: Vegas]]'' | 2007 | [[PlayStation Portable|PSP]] |- | ''[[TMNT (video game)|TMNT]]'' | 2007 | [[PlayStation Portable|PSP]], [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''[[Cranium Kabookii|Cranium: Kabookii]]'' | 2007 | [[Wii]] |- | ''[[Surf's Up (video game)|Surf's Up]]'' | 2007 | [[PlayStation Portable|PSP]], [[GBA]], [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''Battle of Giants: Dinosaurs'' | 2008 | [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''My Stop Smoking Coach with Allen Carr''http://ds.ign.com/objects/142/14254712.html | 2008 | [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''Battle of Giants: Dragons'' | 2009 | [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''Battle of Giants: Mutant Insects'' http://ds.ign.com/objects/054/054427.html | 2010 | [[Nintendo DS|DS]] |- | ''Battle of Giants: Dinosaurs Strike'' http://wii.ign.com/objects/083/083925.html | 2010 | [[Nintendo Wii|Wii]] |- | ''[[Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands]]'' | 2010 | [[Wii]], [[PlayStation Portable|PSP]] |- | ''[[Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood]] ''(with [[Ubisoft Montreal]]) | 2010 | [[PlayStation 3]], [[Xbox 360]], [[Microsoft Windows]] |- | ''Battle of Giants: Dinosaurs 3D'' http://wii.ign.com/objects/083/083925.html | 2011 | [[Nintendo 3DS|3DS]] |- | ''[[Assassin's Creed: Revelations]] ''(with [[Ubisoft Montreal]]) | 2011 | [[PlayStation 3]], [[Xbox 360]], [[Microsoft Windows]] |} ==External links== * [http://www.facebook.com/ubisoftquebec Ubisoft Quebec's Facebook] * [http://quartiersaintroch.com/fr/ Nouvo St-Roch] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Ubisoft}} [[Category:Video game companies of Canada]] [[Category:Companies based in Quebec City]] [[Category:Ubisoft]] [[fr:Ubisoft QuÃ©bec]] [[ru:Ubisoft Quebec]]
